name: DiabeticMinder
0:
”Alexa, open diabetic minder”
”Alexa, start diabetic minder”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: diabetic minder
des:
Try this checklist to help you keep to your diabetic medication schedule and insulin injections. Too busy to remember to take your blood glucose test? This app will remind you at 8AM everyday! Let's all stay current with our medication and monitor our blood sugar levels regularly. Being diabetic needs a lifestyle change that should include regular glucose level testing and regular medication. But our busy lives may make us forget. This skill was created by a diabetic. Through this skill, monitoring and medicating regularly is made easy by Alexa!

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
